org.engineeringnotebook.glassfishmonitor.instance
Class InstanceListMonitor

java.lang.Object
  org.engineeringnotebook.glassfishmonitor.instance.InstanceListMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, StatusMonitor, Subject
public class InstanceListMonitor
extends Object
implements StatusMonitor, Subject, Runnable

Monitors the status of a set of instances associated with a cluster. Implements the StatusMonitor interface, as all monitors must. Implements the Subject interface to participate in the (GoF) Observer pattern.

Author:
Jeffrey Coble http://engineeringnotebook.org
